name: Metabase Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Metabase Tool 节点。主要用于: Use the Metabase API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Use the Metabase API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: questions

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many alerts

questionId.name: questionId
questionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Question ID | (必填项)

format.name: format
format.natural_language_description: 参数名: Format | 默认值: csv | (必填项)

metricId.name: metricId
metricId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Metric ID | (必填项)

databaseId.name: databaseId
databaseId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Database ID | (必填项)

engine.name: engine
engine.natural_language_description: 参数名: Engine | 默认值: postgres | (必填项)

port.name: port
port.natural_language_description: 参数名: Port | 默认值: 5432 | (必填项)

filePath.name: filePath
filePath.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Path | (必填项)

fullSync.name: fullSync
fullSync.natural_language_description: 参数名: Full Sync | 默认值: True | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

alertId.name: alertId
alertId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Alert ID | (必填项)

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
